channel.title: Alert if not registered
channel.description:
OK, how do I make my website display an alert or pop-up blocker bar thing when a user's IP address is not in my MySQL database (i.e. they are not registered for my forums). All suggestions/scripts are greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance
Jellybean732

item.title: Alert if not registered
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Its simple, no need for spoon feeding, but whatever.

[code]

<?php $IP = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; // query shit, you'll need to do this as i don't know your table information foreach( $QueryVar AS $RegIP ) { if ( $IP == $RegIP ) { $Registered = true; break; } } if ( $Registered == false ) { echo 'You are not registered. '; } else { echo 'You are registered. '; } ?>[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Alert if not registered
item.dc:creator: @Jellybean732 Jellybean732
item.description:
@Jellybean732 wrote:

Thanks, I know what I need to do, I just don’t know how to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Alert if not registered
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Query the ip table
Check for a match
If no match, echo an alert

Read full topic
